channel.title: How does the upgrade item system work in Beyond RSC?
channel.description: In beyond rsc source there are items that range from +1 to +9, but how would a player upgrade their item further from a +1?

item.title: How does the upgrade item system work in Beyond RSC?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Check the InvUseOnItem class.

			if (item1.getID() == item2.getID() && item1.getCompositionLevel() == item2.getCompositionLevel()) {
				int id = item1.getID();
				int lv = item1.getCompositionLevel();
				int count = 0;
				for (InvItem i : player.getInventory().getItems()) {
					if (i.getID() == id && i.getCompositionLevel() == lv)
						count++;
				}
				if (count >= 3 && lv + 1 <= 9) { // 9 = max composition level

					Iterator<InvItem> i = player.getInventory().getItems()
							.iterator();
					int c = 0;
					while (i.hasNext()) {
						InvItem item = i.next();
						if (item.getID() == id
								&& item.getCompositionLevel() == lv) {
							if (item.isWielded()) {
								WieldHandler.doUnWieldItem(player, item, true);
							}
							i.remove();
							c++;
							if (c >= 3)
								break;
						}
					}
					player.getInventory().add(new InvItem(id + InvItem.ORIGINAL_ITEM_COUNT));
					player.getActionSender().sendInventory();
					player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have forged the items");
					return;
				}

			}
			player.getActionSender()
					.sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
		}
	}

Read full topic
item.source: How does the upgrade item system work in Beyond RSC?

item.source: How does the upgrade item system work in Beyond RSC?

item.title: How does the upgrade item system work in Beyond RSC?
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

moparboyrunescape:

There not vague, im asking in beyond rsc there are same weapons and armor that range from +1 to +9. I want to know how would a player upgrade their item from +1 to +2.

Not exactly following, if you’re trying to update individual weapon/armor values you need to look at the itemWieldableDef class for reference (having not looked at the source in a while I don’t actually recall). Usually this is formatted in XML, found with the server-side definition files, same name as the class I listed (usually).

Read full topic

item.title: How does the upgrade item system work in Beyond RSC?
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

moparboyrunescape:

Well if you guys know can you please help me instead of acting smart, this is a server and client help section

Honestly if you don’t know the difference between the two, you won’t go far. Plus, your questions are vague, and I’m guessing based off your question you’re referring to xEnt’s “item composition” or “reborn” system.

item.dc:creator: @Dehumanized Dehumanized
item.description:
@Dehumanized wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:5, topic:353265”][quote author=Dehumanized link=topic=449582.msg3298931#msg3298931 date=1281145196]

l2read the name of the .java files.

Classes, not “.java files”.
[/quote]How would this kid know what classes are? If you’re trying to explain this to someone, “.java files” makes more sense.[/quote]

I was correcting ‘Old Rsc Player’, the self-claimed programmer. Basically being a smart-ass because he was being a smart-ass to the OP.
